response.overview: The worldâ€™s largest martial arts organization will broadcast ONE Friday Fights 138 live in Asia primetime on January 16, and 28 of the most exciting MMA, Muay Thai, and kickboxing rising stars on the planet will have a chance to leave the historic venue with a six-figure contract.  In the headline attraction, surging flyweight Muay Thai strikers Pompet PongSuphan PK and Decho Por Borirak will throw down with the hopes of keeping their momentum rolling toward a life-changing deal and global roster spot.  In the co-main event, explosive Thai knockout artist Chartpayak Saksatoon will go head-to-head with Iraqi striker Ayad Albadr in a strawweight Muay Thai thriller that will have fans on the edge of their seats.  Plus, in the featured attraction, a pair of 20-year-old flyweight Muay Thai practitioners will collide in the ring, as Thai dynamo Brazil Aekmuangnon battles undefeated British-Pakistani sensation Ubaid Hussain.
response.title: ONE Friday Fights 138
